>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/tenants/{tenant_id}/analytics/members/segments/graph"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Retrieve member distribution across segments

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"tenant_id","required":true,"in":"path","schema":{"format":"uuid","type":"string"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Members segments graph data retrieved successfully","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","properties":{"segmentName":{"type":"string","description":"Segment name","example":"Premium Members"},"memberCount":{"type":"number","description":"Number of members in this segment","example":250},"percentage":{"type":"number","description":"Percentage of total members","example":20}},"required":["segmentName","memberCount","percentage"],"title":"MembersSegmentsGraphDataPointDto"}}}}},"401":{"description":"Unauthorized"},"500":{"description":"Internal Server Error"}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
